sql:
SELECT
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  i.i_current_price
FROM item AS i,
  inventory AS inv,
  date_dim AS dd,
  store_sales AS ss
WHERE
  i.i_current_price BETWEEN 30 AND 30 + 30 AND inv.inv_item_sk = i.i_item_sk AND dd.d_date_sk = inv.inv_date_sk AND dd.d_date BETWEEN CAST('2002-05-30' AS date) AND CAST('2002-07-29' AS date) AND i.i_manufact_id IN (437, 129, 727, 663) AND inv.inv_quantity_on_hand BETWEEN 100 AND 500 AND ss.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk
GROUP BY
  i.i_item_id,
  i.i_item_desc,
  i.i_current_price
ORDER BY
  i.i_item_id
LIMIT 100;
hint_str:

 HashJoin(ss i)
 MergeJoin(inv dd)
 BitmapScan(inv)
 IndexScan(dd)
 BitmapScan(ss)
 BitmapScan(i)
